title: Rock Golem

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Slam a player with the weight of your current Defense level.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot use Slam before Night 3, and you cannot use it two nights in a row.
- Each attack against you will reduce your defense level by 1 permanently, to a minimum of None.
- Roleblock, Burn, Douse, Poison, Plague Immune
- Strike Immunity: Thundercry players will think they were successful if they try to place a Strike on you, but it will secretly have failed.

desc:
Post 1731
*Common weapon in mage's duels. Often the only survivor.*
